humans-desc: Counts all people on the server.
bots-desc: Counts all bots on the server.
members-desc: Counts all members on the server (humans+bots).
textchannel-desc: Counts the number of text channels.
voicechannel-desc: Counts the number of voice channels.
channel-desc: Counts the total number of server channels.
totalroles-desc: Counts the total number of server roles.
role-desc: Counts how many members has a role specified below.
bans-desc: Counting of bans in the server
lastuser-desc: Name of the last person who joined the server.
rounding: Round up large numbers into the thousands
tiktok-desc: Counts the number of Tiktok followers of a user.
youtube-desc: Counts the number of Youtube subscribers of a user.
twitch-desc: Counts the number of Twitch followers of a user.
twitch-sub-desc: Counts the number of Twitch subscribers of a user.
twitter-desc: Counts the number of Twitter followers of a user.
twitterTweet-desc: Counts the number of Twitter tweets of a user.
reddit-desc: Counts the number of Reddit subscribers of a user.
online-desc: Counts the number of people online.
onlineRecord-desc: Records the record number of people online on the server.
instagram-desc: Counts the number of Instagram followers of a user.
